description: This file defines the TicketMetricsResponse class, a data transfer object (DTO) used for representing metrics computed from uploaded tickets Excel files, including total tickets, SLA adherence, mean time to resolution, remarks, and additional details.

classes.name: TicketMetricsResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing computed metrics from ticket data, including total tickets, SLA adherence percentage, mean time to resolution in hours, remarks, and optional details.

methods.name: TicketMetricsResponse
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an empty TicketMetricsResponse object.

methods.name: TicketMetricsResponse
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing a TicketMetricsResponse object with specific metrics.

methods.name: getTotalTickets
methods.description: Returns the total number of tickets parsed from the file.

methods.name: setTotalTickets
methods.description: Sets the total number of tickets.

methods.name: getMttrHours
methods.description: Returns the mean time to resolution in hours.

methods.name: setMttrHours
methods.description: Sets the mean time to resolution in hours.

methods.name: getRemarks
methods.description: Returns remarks including warnings or validation notes.

methods.name: setRemarks
methods.description: Sets remarks including warnings or validation notes.
